title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. I, pt. 10 - Proxies, Consents And Authorizations Of Domestic Stock Insurers
content:

State Regulations
§ 10.1 - Application of part 10
§ 10.2 - Proxies, consents and authorizations
§ 10.3 - Disclosure of equivalent information
§ 10.4 - Definitions
§ 10.5 - Information to be furnished to stockholders
§ 10.6 - Requirements as to proxy
§ 10.7 - Material required to be filed
§ 10.8 - False or misleading statements
§ 10.9 - Prohibition of certain solicitations
§ 10.10 - Special provisions applicable to election contests

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. I, pt. 10

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 1201, 1202, 1206, 4211, 4212

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
